cz.kinst.jakub.androidette

Class AndroidetteConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.kinst.jakub.androidette.AndroidetteConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CourseManagerConnector

    public class AndroidetteConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Main Class providing connection to any Web Application based on Nette Framework(http://nette.org)
    Author:
    Jakub Kinst
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
